name: SAPPHIRE INTERNATIONAL AVIATION ACADEMY
about: Sapphire International Aviation Academy, established in 2004, caters to the global demand for aviation professionals. Located in the Philippines, known for its high literacy rate and English proficiency, the academy is a hub for aviation education in Asia. It offers a range of programs including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), and Flight Instructor training, as well as courses in aircraft maintenance, flight dispatching, and tourism management. With multiple campuses in Para√±aque, Oriental Mindoro, Batangas, and Palawan, Sapphire Aviation emphasizes quality in its training programs, facilities, approach, and staff. The academy has produced numerous pilots now working with aviation companies and as flight instructors, making flying an enjoyable and profitable profession. Sapphire Aviation is committed to making a difference in the aviation industry.
services:
["Private Pilot Licensure
Commercial Pilot Licensure
